name: FGameplayCueNotify_CameraLensEffectInfo
doc:
FGameplayCueNotify_CameraLensEffectInfo

    Properties that specify how to play a camera lens effect.

SpawnConditionOverride: Condition to check before playing the camera lens effect.
PlacementInfoOverride: Defines how the camera lens effect will be placed.
WorldInnerRadius: Players inside this radius get the full intensity camera lens effect.
WorldOuterRadius: Players outside this radius do not get the camera lens effect applied.
bOverrideSpawnCondition: If enabled, use the spawn condition override and not the default one.
bOverridePlacementInfo: If enabled, use the placement info override and not the default one.
bPlayInWorld: If enabled, the camera lens effect will be played in the world and affect all players.
